SAW8pc3Bwe.message:
Select a Gamemode for the next round

classic - a regular game of mafia
  Difficulty: Beginner (recommended)
chaos - all available roles will be given out (no villagers)
  Difficulty: Intermediate
crazy - chaos mode plus a few extra fun roles (coming soon)
  Difficulty: Challenging
SAW8pc3Bwe.name: mode selection

XB1aLkHLDA.message: Do you want to reveal yourself this round?
XB1aLkHLDA.name: mayor reveal choice

abH7epkh8s.message:
Mafia how to play

Villagers wins when all mafia are dead

villager - Sleeps at night like a good boy. Helps the town lynch the bad bois
sheriff - Can find out a person's side each night
doctor - Is able to save a person each night (cannot save himself)
mayor - Can reveal himself to the town. His votes will be doubled once he reveals, and his skin will change
vigilante - Has 3 arrows which he can use to shoot a player during the night. If the player he shot is innocent, he will suicide out of guilt
watcher - Can target a player to watch each night. They will recieve the names of the players who visited their target. All roles that have an action during the night can visit a player (only one mafia gets selected to kill a player)
cookie giver - Can give a cookie to a player anonymously each night. The player with the cookie will have their votes doubled for one day

Mafia wins when the amount of mafias reaches half of all players alive

godfather - Decides someone to kill with his mafias each night. Shows up as good when investigated upon, and will turn into a mafia when all of his mafias are dead. If the godfather dies, the mafia team loses instantly (requires 10+ players)
mafia - They work with each other to select someone to kill each night.
framer - Can frame someone each night. Framed person will show up as evil if investigated upon (only works on villagers). If they are the last player on the mafia team, they turn into a mafia

Neutral different win conditions for each role

joker - Wins by being lynched by the town
executioner - Wins if his target gets lynched while he is alive. If his target dies, then he becomes a joker (target is a villager and is not a mayor)
cultist - Their main objective is to bamboozle everyone alive to join their cult. Once they do, the village has one day to vote the cultist out before the cultist wins. The cultist cannot die during the night
serial killer - Cannot be killed during the night and selects someone to kill each night. Wins when there is only one person alive besides them.
survivor - Wins by staying alive until the villagers or mafia wins. Cannot be killed during the night

NOTE: the roles included in your game depends on how many people there are
P to see this again
B to open the skin shop
O to help with boredom
H to view your current role
C to talk with dead people (if you're dead)
abH7epkh8s.name: game info

dwhymJYXpN.message:
Rip you died on the first night

well, uhh, this game might seem bad to you, but it's not!
wait it is? well it is sad dying the first night but, uhh, there's some stuff to do!

  • spectate - you can spectate the game, it could be fun to watch
  • read - pressing P gives you more information on what this game is (and the roles)
  • watch - if you press O it gives you a youtube video to watch
  • browse - you can explore our skin shop by pressing B
  • chat - i'm not sure if there's anyone else that's dead yet, but if there is you can press C to chat with them
  • explore - you can explore the different sections of the map :)
pls don't leave
dwhymJYXpN.name: first night death

yGkY8830bj.message:
Mafia how to play

Lynching hanging, for an alleged offense with or without a legal trial

deciding someone to lynch (first phase)- more than half of the town must vote to lynch a specific individual to move onto the next stage
final vote (second phase) - more than half of the people alive (minus the person being accused) must vote guilty
lynched role - if a player get's lynched and they were the joker or the executioner's target, the game will immediately end

Proper Etiquette Guidelines be polite

don't throw - if you get a role you don't like, or you're just being salty, don't try and make your team lose. this ruins the game for everyone
failure to abide by these guidelines will result in a kick, ban, or even a spank irl

P to see this again
B to open the skin shop
O to help with boredom
H to view your current role
C to talk with dead people (if you're dead)
yGkY8830bj.name: game info (pt. 2)
